title: 3dnewid
description: Assigns a new ID code to a dataset, ensuring internal ID codes remain unique.

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.description: Input datasets to assign new ID codes.

fun.title: Randomly generated ID codes
fun.description: Generate n randomly generated ID codes. If n is not present, 1 ID code is printed.

fun11.title: 11 character ID code flag
fun11.description: Generate an 11 character ID code for use in scripting

int.title: Random positive integer flag
int.description: Generate a random positive integer between 1 million and 1 billion.

hash.title: Hash code of string
hash.description: Generate a unique hash code of the provided string. The same string produces the same hash code.

MD5.title: MD5 hash of string
MD5.description: Generate the MD5 hash of the provided string. Output should be the same as the -hash output without the prefix and without the + and / char substitutions.
